title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
While pasta cooks, heat a skillet over medium heat. Add pancetta and cook until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain spaghetti. Add hot spaghetti to the skillet with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, 1 tbsp tikka masala spice, and salt. Add chicken chunks and marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook marinated chicken until browned and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes. Remove and set aside.
In the same skillet, add more oil if needed. Saut√© onion until golden, about 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and remaining tikka masala spice. Cook until tomatoes are soft and oil separates.
Stir in cream and bring to a simmer. Add cooked chicken back to the sauce and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.
